newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungarian O/N rates ease to end at 20.50 pct.
newsitem.headline: Hungarian O/N rates ease to end at 20.50 pct.

text.p: Hungary's overnight interest rates eased to 20.50 percent on Friday in a balanced market, traders said.
On Thursday, overnight rates finished at 20.75 percent.
"The bank that took up a lot of money on Thursday retreated (from heavy takings) today," said Balazs Varga of Inter-Europa Bank.
Traders said on Thursday that overnight rates were relatively high due to the fact that one or two banks took up significant amounts of money, probably on customer orders.
Varga added that overnight rates were likely to ease back to around 20.25 percent, the level of the central bank's benchmark one-week reverse repo rate, over the next days.
Under normal conditions, Hungary's overnight interest rates usually hover around that benchmark.
